DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to test individual donor samples (IDSs) with the investigational Dengue Assay on the TIGRIS System and to further characterize the Dengue Assay in the clinical setting.
DOC.brief_title: ProcleixÂ® Dengue Virus Assay Testing of Individual Donor Samples From Puerto Rican and US Blood Donors - CTS
DOC.criteria: Donor must meet all the blood collection sites' standard eligibility requirements. Donor and/or legally authorized representative must be willing to undergo the site's routine informed consent process prior to study participation.
